title: Samsung Digital Video Baby Monitor System

title: Chaco Kids' Unisex Outcross Shoes

description:
Best Buy via eBay offers the Hasbro DropMix Music Gaming System for $49.99 with free shipping. (Amazon charges the same.) That's tied mention from three weeks ago as the lowest price we've seen. Note: This game requires a mobile device and a download of the free DropMix app to play.

title: Refurb Wildgame Innovations 7" Android Tablet
description:
Erequisite via eBay offers the refurbished Wildgame Innovations Trail Pad Series 7" Android Photo Media Viewer Tablet for $24.99 with free shipping. That's the lowest price we could find by $10. It features Android 4.1 software, 8GB internal memory, water resistant housing, and Wi-Fi.

Note: No warranty information is provided

title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds for XB1
description:
CDKeys offers Steam downloads of PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds for Xbox One for $23.99. Coupon code "CDK36454" cuts that price to $23.25. Plus, receive a free Steam download of Assassin's Creed Unity for Xbox One. That's $2 under our October mention, $10 off, and the lowest price we could find.

Note: This game is early access, which means that it is not complete, and may or may not change further. Also, new customers can provide an email address on the CDKeys Facebook page to get a unique coupon code that cuts an extra 5% off.

title: Monoprice 27" 1440p AVHA LCD Display

That's $12 under our mention from a month ago, $42 off list, and the lowest price we've seen. It features a native resolution of 2560x1440 (1440p), DisplayPort, HDMI, dual-link DVI-D, and VGA.

description: In select ZIP codes only, Walmart offers the Logitech Harmony Smart Control with Universal Remote for the in-cart price of $79. It drops to $58 when you choose in-store pickup. That's tied with our mention from a week ago as the best price we've seen in over a year and it's the lowest price we could find today by $21. The Harmony Smart Control works on more than 225,000 devices and features Bluetooth 3.0, a universal remote with 50 favorite channel icons, and support for Amazon's Alexa voice control. The hub also works with the Harmony app for iOS or Android.

It includes a locomotive and tender, 3-dome tank car, boxcar, caboose, eight curved FasTrack track pieces, one 10" straight FasTrack plug-expand-play power lock-on section, FasTrack terminal piece, two 10" straight FasTrack pieces, and control via Bluetooth.

title: Bank of America® Travel Rewards Credit Card
Call of Duty: WWII for PS4 / Xbox One

title: Refurb Asus ZenFone 3 16GB Android Phone
description:
Newegg offers the refurbished Unlocked Asus ZenFone 3 Max 16GB 4G LTE GSM Android Smartphone in Gray for $69.99 via the instructions below. With free shipping, that's $10 under last month's mention, $60 under the lowest price we could find for a new unit and the best price we've seen in any condition. The phone features a 4,100mAh battery, which lasts up to 30 days on standby and doubles as a power bank. Additional features include an MediaTek MT6737 1.25GHz quad-core processor, 5.2" 1280x720 (720p) IPS touchscreen LCD, 2GB RAM, 16GB storage, 13-megapixel rear camera, 5-megapixel front-facing camera, 1080p video recording, 802.11n wireless, Bluetooth 4.0, microSD card slot, fingerprint sensor, and Android 6.0 OS (Marshmallow). Deal ends January 31. To get this deal:
  1. Add the refurbished Unlocked Asus ZenFone 3 Max 16GB 4G LTE GSM Android Smartphone to cart for $89.99
  2. coupon code "EMCSPEPV3" cuts it to $79.99
  3. redeem this $10 rebate for a final price of $69.99
Note: A 90-day warranty applies but it's unclear who covers it.

Note: A 1-year Hitachi warranty applies.

title: 4 Months of DirecTV Now w/ Apple TV 4K 32GB
description:
At DirecTV Now, prepay for four months of DirecTV Now service for $140 ($35/month) and receive the recently-released Apple TV 4K 32GB Media Receiver for free via the steps below. It features Apple's A10X Fusion chip, which is 2x faster and provides 4x GPU performance over the previous generation Apple TV. It also supports 4K HDR content via HDR 10 and Dolby Vision. This deal includes the "Live a Little" package from DirecTV Now, which offers over 60 channels to stream live, with many shows available on demand. After four months, you'll be billed $35/month for the service, but you may cancel at any time. To get this deal:
  1. On this page, click "Redeem & Stream"
  2. create your account
  3. select the "Live a Little" tab and click "Continue with this plan"
  4. on the add-ons page, click "Skip for now"
  5. choose the Apple TV 4K and click "Add to plan", then click "Continue"
  6. you'll see a final price of $140 on the checkout page
Note: You must use Chrome or Safari as your browser to get this deal.

title: Dr. Meter Soft Baby Proof Corner Guard 24pk

description:

title: Top 5 Deals You Need to Know This Morning: A Dyson at Its Lowest Price
description: Today you can make the idea of vacuuming a little more bearable by saving big on a Dyson. Check out this offer and more in our roundup of the top five Editors' Choice deals we found last night and this morning.

title: Oops! Apple Messed Up, But You Can Get a MUCH Cheaper Battery Out Of It
description: Recently it came to light that Apple has been slowing down batteries on older iPhones. Not surprisingly, users were unhappy with this news. But now, Apple is trying to make things right and regain their customers' trust.

title: 8 Smart Ways to Save on Exercise Equipment
description: If your goal is to tone up and slim down this year, there are several ways to get the fitness equipment you need without breaking the bank. Check out our tips to help you save on exercise equipment, so you can stick to that resolution and get in shape.

title: 8 Things to Buy in January (and 3 Things to Wait On)
description: Ready or not, 2018 is here! That means we're done with the holiday sales and on to the post-holiday sales. While you won't find everything on sale in January, some items are real bargains this time of year — like gym memberships, bedding, and hotel stays.

title: Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card
Liberty Mutual Auto Insurance
description:
Liberty Mutual offers discounted rates on policies for teen drivers. You may qualify for rate reductions if your teen is:
  • Under the age of 21 and completes a qualifying driver training program
  • living at a school more than 100 miles from your home and occasionally drives your vehicle
  • under the age of 25, who achieve at least a B (3.0) average
